name: Madregora
description:
Madregora is a mandrake root puppet who came to life by a mysterious green orb that is illuminating life and movement in her hollow eyes.  It's a 2D Platform and also a bit of a puzzle to understand how to finish a level, in this first release I made two levels, one is with some instructions on mechanics and the second level is what the would look like from the level design aspect. Level 3 is easier and very fun (you'll see why)

So hey play and please leave a feedback as this is my first solo game and I would love to hear some ~brain vomits~ about it! <3
